house_listing.house_description: Kitchen/keeping room combination, master bedroom w/bath, new appliances, new heat & central air, large fenced yard, insulated windows, new carpet, fresh paint, great family home within walking distance of elementary school. Close to bases.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Ranch Style, Storage Space, UtilityRoom
